item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 16 Nov 2021
item.description:
1. Early preview of the Algorithmic with OCaml Book
  2. pyml_bindgen: a CLI app to generate Python bindings directly from OCaml value specifications
  3. ocaml-wayland (pure OCaml wayland protocol library)
  4. Set up OCaml 2.0.0-beta6
  5. Set up OCaml 2.0.0-beta7
  6. Set up OCaml 2.0.0-beta8
  7. phylogenetics, a library for molecular evolution
  8. release of svmwrap: a wrapper around libsvm-tools
  9. GeoPub - A XMPP web client
